item.description:
ARTWALK Newburyport is a self-paced / self-guided tour of several galleries and studios throughout downtown-and beyond Newburyport. They open their doors 3:00 pm - 7:00 pm with special exhibits, discussions, painting demos, live music, refreshments, and more- all in a casual reception environment. Maps can be found online @ http://www.artwalknewburyport.org/ or at the visitor's center when you arrive. This event is FREE.

A quote from someone that has attended in the past years; “ARTWALK has always been great! Some of the galleries go all out with refreshments, entertainment, and appetizers.”

Please be advised that this is a walking tour and we will be doing a lot of that. There is no set plan when finished with the tour- perhaps; Waterfront Park, the new self-serve ice cream parlor, the quaint lounges and restaurants, a walk along the water with some new friends, or take the 10 min drive to Plum Island and enjoy the beautiful sunset from the beach (whoooo).....

THIS IS A SHARED EVENT with other meetup groups.
* We will meetup between 3:00 and 3:15 pm In front of The Firehouse Center For The Arts. If facing the center, the bench to the left- by the shady tree, myself or someone will be wearing a meetup.com pin or have a sign - my contact # will be added closer to the date. **Parking can be tight - so try to plan accordingly. Please consider carpooling with other members. It’s a great way to get to know someone new or travel with a friend. Just post your comments.
item.name: ARTWALK NEWBURYPORT
